contexts.context: ...river, where the second eldest Coribael brother, <mark>Horis</mark>, stood guard. Horis, who was faster...
...eldest Coribael brother, Horis, stood guard. <mark>Horis</mark>, who was faster than his brother Vanis,...
Baranat rushed at <mark>Horis</mark>, and two plunged into the rushing river....
...they wrestled one another under the water, until <mark>Horis</mark> could hold his breath no more and drowned....
